sentence: What do you call it when you give chairs to the poor? a chair-ity!
explanation: a type of furniture used for sitting
first_new_sentence: I bought a chair for my living room today.
second_new_sentence: The chair of the committee will lead the meeting.

sentence: What do you call a short mexican? a paragraph, because theyre too short to be an ese
explanation: a distinct section of written text
first_new_sentence: The professor assigned a lengthy paragraph for the essay.
second_new_sentence: Each paragraph in the report should contain a main idea.

sentence: What do you call an accurate dog? spot-on.
first_new_sentence: The dog had a brown spot on its back.
second_new_sentence: The candidate was spot on with his answer during the debate.

sentence: Feel free to ask if you need more examples or further modifications!
